revised_title: Measurement of an Arc on the Meridian and Determination of the Compression of the Polar Axis
tldr: Lieutenant Colonel William Lambton presents the results of his measurements of an arc on the meridian, spanning from latitude 8°9'38" to 18°3'23", in India. He compares the lengths of degrees in this arc using French, English, and Swedish measures, and calculates the compression of the polar axis.
